document.full_text: tim thomas had 33 saves, including a crucial one with 11 minutes left, as boston won game 5 over tampa bay to take a 3-2 series lead.
document.title: bruins 3, lightning 1: thomas's goaltending is key in bruins' victory
lines_and_colors: tim thomas had 33 saves, including a crucial one with 11 minutes left, as boston won game 5 over tampa bay to take a 3-2 series lead.
